author: Shayla Love, Kate Lowenstein
title: There’s Another Crucial Coronavirus Test We Need Access To
description: The tests we have now tell us who is currently sick. We need to know who has already had COVID-19 and recovered.
content: Getting tested for COVID-19, the disease caused by the new coronavirus, has been difficult and confusing. Mistakes were made by the CDC, FDA, and thefederal government that delayed the roll-out and accessibility of the tests (unless you're a celebrity). South… [+11171 chars]
